title: Remote Space
shortDescription: Privacy-focused cloud storage with true end-to-end AES encryption — zero-knowledge architecture where the server never sees plaintext.
shortDescriptionIt: Cloud storage incentrato sulla privacy con crittografia AES end-to-end — architettura zero-knowledge dove il server non vede mai il testo in chiaro.
features: Secure file sharing with granular permissions
featuresIt: Condivisione file sicura con permessi granulari
